DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you are about to lose #yBlock, consume one #yHype instead.

togawasakikomod:CharismaticFormPower.NAME: Charismatic Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy gains a buff, you gain the same buff. Does not stack.

togawasakikomod:CrychicPower.NAME: Crychic
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add a random #yPhantom card with 0 cost to your hand.

togawasakikomod:WorldviewPower.NAME: Worldview
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw an unplayable card, transform it into a #yMelody. Does not stack.

togawasakikomod:DolorisPower.NAME: Doloris
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage taken ignores your #yBlock.

togawasakikomod:MortisPower.NAME: Mortis
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you take damage, add an #yInjury card to your draw pile.

togawasakikomod:OblivionisPower.NAME: Oblivionis
DESCRIPTIONS: Attack cards you play will be #yExhausted.

togawasakikomod:TimorisPower.NAME: Timoris
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, convert all #yTimoris into an equivalent number of #yVulnerable.

togawasakikomod:KingsPower.NAME: Kings
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduces the number of card rewards available for selection by 1 in this battle. Does not stack.
